channel.title: Portals.. help needed!
channel.description: ok i have 10 portals, i want to make them into 5, so what i want is, when u click on a portal 2 options come up, for 2 portals, this way it turns to 5, but how do i do this? (i want it to be like the ring of dueling when u click it then the option comes up in the chat box) please help!
